Text:
How does one use the subtitles?  I've extracted to the same location as the movie, and ensured the names were the same. 

I'm using VLC, which normally plays everything.  Here is the error:

VLC can't recognize the input's format:
The format of 'file:///N:/Movies/American.Graffiti.1973.720p.BluRay.X264-AMIABLE/American.Graffiti.1973.720p.BluRay.X264-AMIABLE.sub' cannot be detected. Have a look at the log for details.
